passive_1: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take 10 magic damage (+ 1% AP) every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, for a total of 60 (+ 6% AP). Against monsters, the burn deals 10 bonus magic damage per tick, dealing a total of 20 magic damage (+ 2% AP) per tick for up to 120 (+ 12% AP).

motd: Bugfix: Baleful Blaze's damage is no longer able to incorrectly grant stacks of Spear of Shojin's Focused Will, if both items are owned
